name: CKEDITOR.dtd
doc:
Holds and object representation of the HTML DTD to be used by the editor in its internal operations.

Each element in the DTD is represented by a property in this object. Each property contains the list of elements that can be contained by the element. Text is represented by the # property.

Several special grouping properties are also available. Their names start with the $ character.

// Check if <div> can be contained in a <p> element.
alert( !!CKEDITOR.dtd[ 'p' ][ 'div' ] ); // false

// Check if <p> can be contained in a <div> element.
alert( !!CKEDITOR.dtd[ 'div' ][ 'p' ] ); // true

// Check if <p> is a block element.
alert( !!CKEDITOR.dtd.$block[ 'p' ] ); // true

members.name: $blockLimit
members.doc:
List of elements that contain other blocks, in which block-level operations should be limited, this property is not intended to be checked directly, use CKEDITOR.dom.elementPath.blockLimit instead.

Some examples of editor behaviors that are impacted by block limits:

  • Enter key never split a block-limit element;
  • Style application is constraint by the block limit of the current selection.
  • Pasted html will be inserted into the block limit of the current selection.

Note: As an exception <li> is not considered as a block limit, as it's generally used as a text block.
members.default: {article: 1, aside: 1, audio: 1, body: 1, caption: 1, details: 1, dir: 1, div: 1, dl: 1, fieldset: 1, figcaption: 1, figure: 1, footer: 1, form: 1, header: 1, hgroup: 1, main: 1, menu: 1, nav: 1, ol: 1, section: 1, table: 1, td: 1, th: 1, tr: 1, ul: 1, video: 1}
members.short_doc:
List of elements that contain other blocks, in which block-level operations should be limited,
this property is not i...

members.name: $cdata
members.doc: List of elements that contain character data.
members.short_doc: List of elements that contain character data. ...

members.name: $editable
members.doc: List of elements that are accepted as inline editing hosts.
members.default: {address: 1, article: 1, aside: 1, blockquote: 1, body: 1, details: 1, div: 1, fieldset: 1, figcaption: 1, footer: 1, form: 1, h1: 1, h2: 1, h3: 1, h4: 1, h5: 1, h6: 1, header: 1, hgroup: 1, main: 1, nav: 1, p: 1, pre: 1, section: 1}
members.short_doc: List of elements that are accepted as inline editing hosts. ...

members.name: $empty
members.default: {area: 1, base: 1, basefont: 1, br: 1, col: 1, command: 1, dialog: 1, embed: 1, hr: 1, img: 1, input: 1, isindex: 1, keygen: 1, link: 1, meta: 1, param: 1, source: 1, track: 1, wbr: 1}
members.short_doc: List of empty (self-closing) elements, like <br> or <img>. ...

members.name: $intermediate
members.doc: List of elements that are not to exist standalone that must live under it's parent element.
members.default: {caption: 1, colgroup: 1, dd: 1, dt: 1, figcaption: 1, legend: 1, li: 1, optgroup: 1, option: 1, rp: 1, rt: 1, summary: 1, tbody: 1, td: 1, tfoot: 1, th: 1, thead: 1, tr: 1}
members.short_doc: List of elements that are not to exist standalone that must live under it's parent element. ...

members.name: $listItem
members.doc: List of list item elements, like <li> or <dd>.
members.short_doc: List of list item elements, like <li> or <dd>. ...

members.name: $nonBodyContent
members.doc: List of elements which may live outside body.

members.name: $nonEditable
members.doc: Elements that accept text nodes, but are not possible to edit into the browser.
members.default: {applet: 1, audio: 1, button: 1, embed: 1, iframe: 1, map: 1, object: 1, option: 1, param: 1, script: 1, textarea: 1, video: 1}
members.short_doc: Elements that accept text nodes, but are not possible to edit into the browser. ...

members.name: $object
members.doc: Elements that are considered objects, therefore selected as a whole in the editor.
members.default: {applet: 1, audio: 1, button: 1, hr: 1, iframe: 1, img: 1, input: 1, object: 1, select: 1, table: 1, textarea: 1, video: 1}
members.short_doc: Elements that are considered objects, therefore selected as a whole in the editor. ...

members.name: $removeEmpty
members.doc: List of elements that can be ignored if empty, like <b> or <span>.
members.default: {abbr: 1, acronym: 1, b: 1, bdi: 1, bdo: 1, big: 1, cite: 1, code: 1, del: 1, dfn: 1, em: 1, font: 1, i: 1, ins: 1, label: 1, kbd: 1, mark: 1, meter: 1, output: 1, q: 1, ruby: 1, s: 1, samp: 1, small: 1, span: 1, strike: 1, strong: 1, sub: 1, sup: 1, time: 1, tt: 1, u: 1, 'var': 1}
members.short_doc: List of elements that can be ignored if empty, like <b> or <span>. ...

members.name: $tabIndex
members.doc: List of elements that have tabindex set to zero by default.
members.default: {a: 1, area: 1, button: 1, input: 1, object: 1, select: 1, textarea: 1}
members.short_doc: List of elements that have tabindex set to zero by default. ...

members.name: $tableContent
members.doc: List of elements used inside the <table> element, like <tbody> or <td>.
members.default: {caption: 1, col: 1, colgroup: 1, tbody: 1, td: 1, tfoot: 1, th: 1, thead: 1, tr: 1}
members.short_doc: List of elements used inside the <table> element, like <tbody> or <td>. ...

members.name: $transparent
members.doc: List of "transparent" elements. See W3C's definition of "transparent" element.
members.default: {a: 1, audio: 1, canvas: 1, del: 1, ins: 1, map: 1, noscript: 1, object: 1, video: 1}

short_doc:
Holds and object representation of the HTML DTD to be used by the
editor in its internal operations. ...
